刘世航，男，2022 年毕业于云南大学物理与天文学院天文菁英班，获理学学士学位。现为广西大学物理科学与工程学院硕士研究生，导师为李博华。研究方向为21cm宇宙学，研究兴趣包含21cm宇宙学、第一代天体、暗物质、宇宙大尺度结构的形成与演化；同时也很关注21cm前景处理和机器学习在宇宙学中的应用等细分方向。 这是我的个人主页，你可以在这里找到我的笔记、文章和代码，我现在只是硕士在读，所以内容会比较基础和稚嫩，欢迎指导批评！我正在寻找博士位置中,我希望我的学术生涯能和这个网站一样持续建设下去！

My name is Shihang Liu, a current Master’s student in cosmology at Guangxi University, supervised by Bohua Li.
This is my personal academic homepage, where you can find my CV, research/study notes, publications, and other relevant information. The pages are still under construction as my academic journey progresses. Since I’m still in the early stages of my research, some content may be quite basic—any advice or feedback would be greatly appreciated!
I am currently seeking PhD opportunities, and I hope both my academic career and this website will continue to evolve over time.



Cosmology (21cm Cosmology, First Galaxies, Dark Matter, Large Scale Structure Formation and Evolution)
Data analysis (21cm foreground removal, applications of machine learning in cosmology)
